thread.title: Off duty: Christian Atsu spends time at Baba Rahman's London home
thread.title_full: Off duty: Christian Atsu spends time at Baba Rahman's London home

title: Off duty: Christian Atsu spends time at Baba Rahman's London home
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 12:55 CET Off duty: Christian Atsu spends time at Baba Rahman's London home - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghana internationals Christian Atsu and Abdul Baba Rahman will not be involved in any football action during the international break as both players are ruled out of Black Stars' friendly against Canada in Washington on Tuesday. 
AllSports.com.gh sources confirm Abdul Baba Rahman's absence from the senior national team is as a result of visa issues for his travel to the United States of America. 
Christian Atsu spent his Saturday at his international teammate's London home to watch the Euro 2016 qualifying game between Bosnia-Hrzegovina and Wales. 
The AFC Bournemouth player said on instagram:'Watching Bosnia vs Wales with @baba_rahman_ #TeamGodIsTheReason #GodWin #London' 
Christian Atsu joined AFC Bournemouth on loan from Chelsea and is yet to make his Premier League debut for the club. Baba Rahman has also not featured in the Premier League since arriving from Augsburg in the summer transfer window. 
Follow @kboakye92
